html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12622022-12-02,  JUS,  DND,  CAJ,  ,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectRules Amending the Court Martial Appeal Court Rules
PrecisRules Amending the COURT MARTIAL APPEAL COURT RULES in order to (1) allow a party to be represented by a lawyer on a defined, limited mandate; (2) allow parties to serve and file documents via electronic submission; (3) allow hybrid hearings by telephone or by videoconference; and (4) make technical and consequential amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0253 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Rules Amending the Court Martial Appeal Court Rules
precis: Rules Amending the COURT MARTIAL APPEAL COURT RULES in order to (1) allow a party to be represented by a lawyer on a defined, limited mandate; (2) allow parties to serve and file documents via electronic submission; (3) allow hybrid hearings by telephone or by videoconference; and (4) make technical and consequential amendments.
